plot outline: Hanmya is raised by village Sarpanch and his wife he is devote of lord Hanuman and very caring towards the villagers his daily work includes helping the needy and fighting against injustice.He helps an old lady Akka on outskirts of village in collecting herbs from jungle.Once while collecting herbs Hanmya interacts with Monkeys and eats a fruit thrown by one of them.When he returns to Akka she finds that he has got magical power in him which is gift of God and can be used only 11 times.
title: Huppa Huiyya
plot: A heart warming tale of faith overcoming obstacles.

Hanmya is raised by village Sarpanch and his wife he is devote of lord Hanuman and very caring towards the villagers his daily work includes helping the needy and fighting against injustice.He helps an old lady Akka on outskirts of village in collecting herbs from jungle.Once while collecting herbs Hanmya interacts with Monkeys and eats a fruit thrown by one of them.When he returns to Akka she finds that he has got magical power in him which is gift of God and can be used only 11 times.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
